jcr:content.jcr:description: Sign up for Klarna and you may be eligible to finance your Altra Running order in four easy payments with zero interest. Buy now, run now, then pay later.

image.alt: Person hiking across rocks with Klarna logo overlaid
Black Klarna logo on a pink background

text.text:
FOUR EASY PAYMENTS.
ZERO INTEREST.

text_1144646859.text:
PICK YOUR PRODUCT(S) 

Then add them to your cart.

text_1144646859_copy.text:
SELECT KLARNA AT CHECKOUT 

To split your purchase into four payments.

PLACE YOUR ORDER 

And we will ship it right to you.

text_1144646859.text: Enter the credit or debit card of your choice to use Klarna on orders between $35 - $1,000.

text_1144646859_copy.text: You’ll know if you’re approved instantly, and your order will ship right away.
Automatic payments will be charged to your card every two weeks. Always zero interest and no fees if paid on time.*

image.alt: Infographic detailing payment periods - 1st payment is day of purchase; 2nd payment two weeks later; 3rd payment four weeks later; final payment six weeks later

text_copy_copy_copy.text: Keep track of your Klarna orders

text.text:
Klarna will send you an email confirmation and payment reminders for each order.

Create and log into your Klarna account to view your orders and manage your account details.

SAFE AND SECURE

Klarna uses the latest safeguards and security to protect your information and prevent unauthorized purchases. You have zero fraud liability with Klarna’s Buyer Protection policy.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
* CA resident loans made or arranged pursuant to a California Finance Lenders Law license

At this time, the Pay Later in 4 option is not available in New Mexico
